Independence Township is located in Saline County, Illinois. As of the 2010 census, its population was 1,118 and it contained 478 housing units.
Geography
According to the 2010 census, the township has a total area of , of which  (or 98.66%) is land and  (or 1.34%) is water.
|footnote=U.S. Decennial Census
}}
